structure.unit: STATE AND REGIONAL MENTAL HEALTH PROGRAMS

law.catch_line: Regional planning councils -- Groups to be invited to join council.

text.section: The regional community boards for mental health or individuals with an intellectual disability established under KRS 210.370 shall institute regional planning councils for the purpose of conducting assessment and strategic planning. The councils shall be attached to the community boards for mental health or individuals with an intellectual disability for administrative purposes.
A member of the regional community board for mental health or individuals with an intellectual disability shall serve as chair of the regional planning council.
The regional planning councils may establish bylaws and procedures to assist in the operation of the councils.

law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 146, sec. 91, effective July 12, 2012. -- Amended 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 5, sec. 3, effective June 24, 2003. -- Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 507, sec. 4, effective April 21, 2000.
